title: Real-time Shogi
rule-text:
The movement of the pieces is the same as normal shogi, but 
there are no turns. You can move multiple times in succession, 
but moved pieces cannot be moved for a certain period.The Try 
Victory rule is adopted. You win when your king reaches the 
starting position of the opponent's king (5-1 for the first player, 
5-9 for the second player).
manual-text:
Mouse Drag - Move Piece
Right Drag - Do not promote

Space - Pawn
Q - Lance  W - Knight  E - Bishop
A - Silver   S - Gold      D - Rook
name: Name

rei.name: Rei Hizuki
rei.profile:
A freelance 'problem solver' agent based in the night city, shrouded 
in mystery. Rumored to perfectly fulfill any difficult request, regardless 
of legality, in exchange for a high reward.
quotes: Hesitation is the first step toward defeat.

aoi.name: Aoi Minase
aoi.profile:
A very ordinary and unremarkable high school girl attending a school 
in the city. However, at night, she transforms into the legendary 
genius gamer and white hacker 'Cyber Serene'.
quotes: ...There, the line of sight is clear.
Yes, thank you for your hard work.

akira.name: Akira Hinowa
akira.profile:
A young female owner who runs the members-only hidden jazz bar 
'Solstice'. Her other face is that of a neutral information broker named 
'Oracle', where all kinds of information from the underworld gathers.
quotes: Is the deal sealed, I wonder?
Please be quiet in my shop.
Everyone is a pawn of something.
...That's an interesting story. Tell me a bit more.
